items.sentence: You\'re a good student, but you still have a lot to learn.
You\'re going to have to do better to convince me of that.
Are you having any difficulty breathing through your nose?
We have to learn all the songs before the end of the week.
Tom told me that he doesn\'t have any brothers or sisters.
I haven\'t been back here since that unfortunate incident.
Tom is the only one in our family who can\'t speak French.
Tom couldn\'t understand why Mary was acting so strangely.
Tom didn\'t decide to become a writer until he was thirty.
Tom didn\'t even have enough money to buy a cup of coffee.
